com.skyisland.questmanager.region

Class RegionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.region.RegionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class RegionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Alarmable<EnemyAlarms>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegionManager()
      Creates an empty enemy manager with a default spawnrate of 3 seconds
      RegionManager(double spawnrate)
      Creates an enemy manager with the provided spawn rate
      RegionManager(java.io.File target)
      Creates a new Enemy Manager using the provided file or files in the provided directory.
      RegionManager(java.io.File target, double spawnrate)
      Creates a new Enemy Manager using the provided file or files in the provided directory.

      • RegionManager

        public RegionManager()
        Creates an empty enemy manager with a default spawnrate of 3 seconds

      • RegionManager

        public RegionManager(double spawnrate)
        Creates an enemy manager with the provided spawn rate

      • RegionManager

        public RegionManager(java.io.File target)
        Creates a new Enemy Manager using the provided file or files in the provided directory. Spawnrate defaults to 3.0
        Parameters:
        target - The file to load or the directory to search for files to load

      • RegionManager

        public RegionManager(java.io.File target,
                     double spawnrate)
        Creates a new Enemy Manager using the provided file or files in the provided directory.
        Parameters:
        target - The file to load or the directory to search for files to load

    • Method Detail

      • registerRegion

        public boolean registerRegion(Region region)
        Registers the region with the manager. Regions must be registered before they can start being associated with enemy types.
        Returns:
        false if the region is null or already in the map, true otherwise

      • addEnemy

        public boolean addEnemy(Region key,
                        Enemy enemy,
                        double weight)
        Adds the enemy to the list of enemies for a region. The underlying list does not make any checks against duplicates. Duplicate adds/inserts will result in duplicate entries.
        Returns:
        false if the region is not in the map, true otherwise

      • addEnemy

        public boolean addEnemy(Region key,
                        Enemy enemy)
        Adds the enemy to the region with a default weight 1
        See Also:
        addEnemy(Region, Enemy, double)

      • clear

        public void clear()

      • getSpawnrate

        public double getSpawnrate()

      • setSpawnrate

        public void setSpawnrate(double spawnrate)

      • alarm

        public void alarm(EnemyAlarms reference)
        Description copied from interface: Alarmable
        Called when the scheduler is trying to remind the registered Alarmable object of something. The reference passed back is the same provided when registered. Receipt of this method indicates that the object is no longer registered with the scheduler.
        Specified by:
        alarm in interface Alarmable<EnemyAlarms>

      • getRegion

        public Region getRegion(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Attempts to find a registered region that the given location falls in
        Returns:
        The region the location lies in, or null if none were found
